tit.e: Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju (The Library of Historical Documents, Continued)
Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju (The Library of Historical Documents, Continued)
Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju (The Library of Historical Documents, Continued)

sen.j: 続群書類従（ぞくぐんしょるいじゅう）は、叢書。
sen.e: Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju is a collection of books.
Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju is a collection of books.
"Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju" is a collection of books.
sen.cmt: Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju にダブルコーテーションを追記しました。

sen.e: In 1,000 volumes.
In 1,000 volumes.
In 1000 volumes.
sen.cmt: 1,000 を 1000 に修正しました。

sen.e: It contains 1,185 books.
It contains 1,185 books.
It contains 1185 books.
sen.cmt: 1,185 を 1185 に修正しました。

sen.e: It is compiled by Hokiichi HANAWA
It is compiled by Hokiichi HANAWA
It is compiled by Hokiichi HANAWA.
sen.cmt: 文末にピリオドを追記しました。

sen.j: 群書類従につづいて群書類従におさめられていない諸書を収集した。
sen.e: As the second series following "Gunsho Ruiju," Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju compiled many books that had not been collected in Gunsho Ruiju.
As the second series following "Gunsho Ruiju," Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju compiled many books that had not been collected in Gunsho Ruiju.
As the second series following the Gunsho Ruiju (Classified Collection of the Japanese Classics), Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju compiled many books that had not been collected in the Gunsho Ruiju.
sen.cmt: "Gunsho Ruiji" を the Gunsho Ruiju (Classified Collection of the Japanese Classics) に修正しました。in Gunsho Ruiju を in the Gunsho Ruiju に修正しました。the Gunsho Ruiju 参考：http://books.google.com/books?id=ecLTH13M2dgC&pg=PR23&dq=Gunsho+Ruiju+Classified&lr=&as_brr=3&hl=ja&cd=5#v=onepage&q=Gunsho%20Ruiju%20Classified&f=false

sen.j: 群書類従と同様に25部にわかち、合計2103種をおさめる。
sen.e: Like Gunsho Ruiju, it is divided into the 25 sections and covers 2,103 categories.
Like Gunsho Ruiju, it is divided into 25 sections and covers 2,103 categories.
Like Gunsho Ruiju, it is divided into 25 sections and covers 2103 categories.
sen.cmt: Gunsho Ruiji に the を追記しました。2,103 を 2103 に修正しました。

sen.j: なお同書の刊行を手掛けていた続群書類従完成会は、2006年9月に不渡りを出して、事実上倒産した。
sen.e: Incidentally, the Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju Completion Committee, which had published Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju, virtually went bankrupt due to a bad check in September 2006.
Incidentally, the Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju Completion Committee, which had published Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju, virtually went bankrupt due to a bad check in September 2006.
Incidentally, the Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju Completion Committee, which had published Zoku-Gunsho Ruiju, virtually went bankrupt due to a bad check in September 2006.

sen.j: 同社は会社更生法の申請を行わず破産の申し立てを、東京地方裁判所に行った。
sen.e: The committee did not seek bankruptcy protection and filed for bankruptcy to Tokyo District Court.
The committee did not seek bankruptcy protection and filed for bankruptcy to Tokyo District Court.
The committee did not seek bankruptcy protection and filed for bankruptcy to Tokyo District Court.

sen.j: 2007年6月より八木書店が、出版事業を継続した。
sen.e: The publishing of Zoku-Gunsho Ruijo has been succeeded by Yagi Book Store since June 2007.
The publishing of Zoku-Gunsho Ruijo has been succeeded by Yagi Book Store since June 2007.
The publishing of Zoku-Gunsho Ruijo has been succeeded by Yagi Book Store since June 2007.
